name: SDO_DAS_XML.addTypes
purpose: To load a second or subsequent schema file to a SDO_DAS_XML object

return.description: None if successful, otherwise throws an exception as described below.

errors:
SDO_TypeNotFoundException
     
     
      
       Thrown if a type is not defined in the underlying model.SDO_DAS_XML_ParserException
     
     
      
       Thrown for any problems while parsing the given XSD File.SDO_DAS_XML_FileException
     
     
      
       Thrown if the specified file cannot be found.
